description: An immersive Indian jungle adventure where you explore mystical villages, ancient temples, and solve spiritual riddles guided by Rajkumar Veer, the Jungle Raja.

village_entrance.name: Shanti Gram Village Entrance
village_entrance.description: A peaceful Indian village with colorful huts, the scent of spices in the air, and children playing near a banyan tree.
village_entrance.ambience: You hear temple bells and the distant sound of a sitar

village_square.name: Village Chowk
village_square.description: The bustling heart of the village with market stalls selling spices, fabrics, and street food.
village_square.ambience: The air is filled with the aroma of masala chai and sizzling pakoras

temple.name: Ancient Shiva Temple
temple.description: A magnificent stone temple with intricate carvings of gods and goddesses.
temple.ambience: You hear the chanting of mantras and the gentle ringing of prayer bells

jungle_edge.name: Dense Jungle Border
jungle_edge.description: Where civilization meets the wild. The jungle ahead is thick with bamboo and teak trees.
jungle_edge.ambience: Monkeys chatter in the distance and peacocks call from the treetops

storyteller.name: Baba Gyan
storyteller.dialogue: Ah, a seeker! The Jungle Raja awaits those with pure intentions and courage.

sadhu.name: Swami Ananda
sadhu.dialogue: The jungle tests not your strength, but your heart. Help others, show compassion.

find_jungle_raja.name: Meet the Jungle Raja
find_jungle_raja.description: Find the legendary Jungle Raja and receive his blessing
